alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:59PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central El Paso County through 345 PM MDT... At 257 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Peyton to near Falcon to Fort Carson. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Colorado Springs, Fountain, Calhan, Ellicott, Peyton, Schriever AFB, Security, Falcon, Security-Widefield, Stratmoor, Fort Carson, Peterson AFB and Cimarron Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
